greeting_message: لقد وصلت مبكرًا! لا يوجد شيء آخر هنا سوى أنت وابتسامتك الرائعة.

button_count_messages.click_message_zero: You've clicked this button like {{count}} times.
button_count_messages.click_message_one: One click? Is that all you've got?
button_count_messages.click_message_few: You've clicked this button like {{count}} times. A 'few' to say the least.
button_count_messages.click_message_many: You've clicked this button like {{count}} 'many' times.
button_count_messages.click_message_other: You've clicked this button like {{count}} 'other' times. You must really like this button.
